name: CopyCat

images.alt: The main window of the application.
images.title: Main Window

images.alt: The window used to scan qr codes and add the encoded data to the system clipboard.
images.title: Import Window

info: A Desktop QR-Code Scanner using the devices webcam.
description: An application to generate a qr code from clipboard content or scan a qr code via webcam and add the content to the system clipboard.
